block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 绘制 DAC 设定值与 ADC 读数的关系图 - 将 DAC（引脚 26）连接到 ADC（引脚 39） plot DAC set value vs ADC reading - connect DAC (pin 26) to ADC(pin 39)

尝试运行此代码 2 次 第一次运行，电源线上没有电容器 第二次运行，添加 100UF 和 10nF 并重试 第二次运行的读数应该比第一次运行干净得多 Try 2 run of this code 1st run, without capacitor on power supply line 2nd run, add 100UF and 10nF and try again The readings from 2nd run should be a lot cleaner than the 1st run

block.comment: 在设置 DAC 输出后，在使用 ADC 读取模拟读数之前需要短暂延迟 need a short delay after set DAC output before we read analog reading using ADC

scripts.comment: 重复 10 次，使用不同颜色显示噪音 repeat 10 times with different color to show the noise

请注意 - 从图中可以看出 DAC 对 ADC 的非线性响应 - 突然的尖峰是由于噪音造成的 - 意味着它不会出现在重复绘制中 Note that - the non-linear response of DAC to ADC is visible from the graph - sudden spikes is due to noise - means it will not appear on repeated draws

custom-block.comment: 笔类别中的自定义图块 custom block in pen category

block.comment: 在设置 DAC 输出后，在使用 ADC 读取模拟读数之前需要短暂延迟 need a short delay after set DAC output before we read analog reading using ADC

scripts.comment: 绘制 DAC 设定值与 ADC 读数的关系图 plot DAC set value vs ADC reading
笔类别中的自定义图块 - 只是图形背景 custom block in pen category - draw the graph background
只是图形背景 just graph background

custom-block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap
